channel.title: Where can i find the die and attack emote of npc? repp ++++++++
channel.description:
i wanna fix and add the die and attack emote for
zombie npc id 76 mummy npc id 2015 and 2016 giant skeleton npc id 1973 and doomion npc id 999
( some of them glitch when they moove ? is it fixable? ) thanks in advance .. ( this is for my dung custom minigame )

item.title: Where can i find the die and attack emote of npc? repp ++++++++
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I have no idea how you could easily find the emote IDs and such, but to fix the glitchy movements of them you will have to get new animations, although I wouldn’t worry about it because no one really cares what the monster looks like, only what the after effects are: drops, experience, etc.

Read full topic
